PC Japanese (JP): 日記を厳重に封印する錠前も、縁寿が心の準備を終えれば、あっさりと解かれる運命にある…。
Russian (RU): Даже тяжёлому замку, держащему дневник в такой секретности, было суждено с лёгкостью отпереться, как только Энджи подготовится...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Até aquela fechadura pesada que segurava o diário com tanta segurança...estava fadada a ser rompida facilmente assim que Ange decidisse prosseguir...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 將日記嚴密封印著的鎖，有著只要緣壽心裡做好準備，就會輕鬆被解開的命運…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 将日记严密封印着的锁，有着只要缘寿心里做好准备，就会轻松被解开的命运…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perfino quel pesante lucchetto che teneva il diario così in sicurezza... era destinato ad essere spazzato via con facilità non appena Ange avesse raccolto la risoluzione definitiva...

Speaker: {f:5:Bernkastel}
Steam (ST): "I won't rush you. You don't have to open it until you're ready."
Umineko Project (UP): "I won't rush you. You don't have to open it until you're ready."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「急かさないわ。あなたの心の準備が付いてから、開けるといい。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「急かさないわ。あなたの心の準備が付いてから、開けるといい」
Russian (RU): "Я не стану торопить тебя. Не открывай его, пока не будешь готова."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu não vou apressá‐la. Você não precisa abrir até estar pronta."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不用著急。你心裡準備好了之後，打開就行。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不用着急。你心里准备好了之后，打开就行。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non ti metterò fretta. Devi aprirlo quando ti sentirai pronta."

Speaker: {f:5:Ange Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "This...includes the truth of what happened at midnight on October 5, 1986, right?"
Umineko Project (UP): "......In here, there's the truth of what happened on October 4th and 5th, 1986, right?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......In here, there's the truth of what happened at midnight after October 5, 1986, right?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……この中には、１９８６年１０月５日２４時に、何が起こったか、記されているのよね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……この中には、１９８６年１０月４日と５日に、何が起こったか、記されているのよね」
Russian (RU): "......В нём правда произошедшего в полночь после 5 октября 1986 года, верно?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Aqui, está a verdade do que aconteceu nos dias 4 e 5 de outubro de 1986, certo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……這裡面，記載了 1986 年 10 月 5 日 24 點時，發生了什麼吧？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……这里面，记载了 1986 年 10 月 5 日 24 点时，发生了什么吧？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Qua dentro, c'è la verità su quello che successe la mezzanotte del 5 Ottobre 1986, vero?"

Speaker: {f:5:Bernkastel}
Steam (ST): "......Yes. It has everything that you wanted to know so much, you offered up your life."
Umineko Project (UP): "...............Yes. Everything that you offered up your life in the hope of learning is there."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........Yes. Everything that you wanted to know so much, you offered up your life."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……………そうよ。あなたが、命と引き換えにしてでも知りたいと願った、全てがね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……………そうよ。あなたが、命と引き換えにしてでも知りたいと願った、全てがね」
Russian (RU): ".........Да. Всё, что ты хотела узнать до такой степени, что пожертвовала своей жизнью."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...............Sim. Tudo pelo qual você ofereceu sua vida na esperança de descobrir está dentro dele."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……………是啊。記載了你以生命作為交換也許願要知道的，全部。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……………是啊。记载了你以生命作为交换也许愿要知道的，全部。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Esatto. Tutto ciò che volevi conoscere così tanto da offrire la tua vita."

Steam (ST): In that instant, two Anges appeared inside of her, taking control of her body at the same time.
Umineko Project (UP): In that instant, inside of Ange, two Anges appeared, taking control of her body at the same time.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In that instant, two Anges appeared inside of her, taking control of her body at the same time.
PC Japanese (JP): その時、縁寿の中には、二人の自分が現れて、同時に自分の体を支配した。
Russian (RU): В это мгновение внутри неё появились две Энджи, одновременно взявшие контроль над её телом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nesse instante, dentro de Ange, duas Anges apareceram, assumindo o controle de seu corpo ao mesmo tempo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這時，緣壽的心裡，出現了兩個自己，同時支配著自己的身體。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这时，缘寿的心里，出现了两个自己，同时支配着自己的身体。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In quell'istante, due Ange apparvero dentro di lei, prendendo il controllo del suo corpo contemporaneamente.

Steam (ST): On the one hand, she knew that she had already paid a great price to learn the truth.
Umineko Project (UP): On the one hand, she knew that she had already paid a great price to learn the truth.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): On the one hand, she knew that she had already paid a great price to learn the truth.
PC Japanese (JP): 一方は、……真実を知るために、自分がすでに代償を支払っていることを知る自分。
Russian (RU): С одной стороны, она знала, что уже заплатила большую цену ради познания правды.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por um lado, ela sabia que já havia pago um grande preço para descobrir a verdade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一個是，……知道為了得到真實，自己已經支付了代價的自己。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一个是，……知道为了得到真实，自己已经支付了代价的自己。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per un verso, sapeva di aver già pagato un enorme prezzo per conoscere la verità.

Steam (ST): This part of her gripped the key, wanting to avoid a second of hesitation that might lead her to refuse to learn the truth now, at the final moment, with the Book of the Single Truth right before her.
Umineko Project (UP): This part of her gripped the key, wanting to act quickly to prevent the moment of hesitation that might lead her to refuse to learn the truth now, at the final moment, with the Book of the Single Truth right before her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This part of her gripped the key, wanting to prevent the moment of hesitation that might lead her to refuse to learn the truth now, at the final moment, with the Book of the Single Truth right before her.
PC Japanese (JP): その自分は、一なる真実の書を前に、わずかの躊躇が心変わりを生み、この土壇場で、自らの手で真実を知ることを拒否するという暴挙に出る前に、その中身を読んでしまおうと鍵を握らせた。
Russian (RU): Эта часть её сжала ключ, желая предотвратить момент сомнения, из‐за которого она могла бы отказаться узнать правду сейчас, в последний момент, с книгой единственной правды прямо перед ней.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Esta parte dela agarrou a chave, querendo agir rapidamente para evitar o momento de hesitação que poderia levá‐la a se recusar a descobrir a verdade agora, no momento final, com o Livro da Única Verdade bem diante dela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這個自己，在唯一真實之書面前，為避免由於些許的躊躇而改變心意，在這最後關頭，做出自己拒絕知道真實這樣的魯莽之舉之前，為了快點閱讀裡面的內容而讓自己握緊鑰匙。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这个自己，在唯一真实之书面前，为避免由于些许的踌躇而改变心意，在这最后关头，做出自己拒绝知道真实这样的鲁莽之举之前，为了快点阅读里面的内容而让自己握紧钥匙。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questa parte di lei strinse la chiave, con l'intenzione di combattere quel momento di esitazione che avrebbe potuto portarla a rifiutare di conoscere la verità ora, nel momento finale, con il Libro dell'Unica Verità dritto davanti a sé.

Steam (ST): On the other hand, ...a feeling as though she was betraying the brother and family who watched over her warmly...made her bite her lower lip.
Umineko Project (UP): On the other hand, ......a feeling that she was betraying the brother and family that watched over her warmly made her bite her lower lip.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): On the other hand, ......a feeling that she was betraying the brother and family that watched over her warmly made her bite her lower lip.
PC Japanese (JP): もう一方の自分は、……兄や、家族、そして温かく自分を見守ってくれた親族たちへの裏切りの気持ちで、下唇を噛ませる。
Russian (RU): С другой стороны, ......чувствуя, что предаёт брата и семью, с теплотой присматривающих за ней, она закусила нижнюю губу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por outro lado, ......um sentimento de que ela estava traindo o irmão e a família que a observavam calorosamente a fez morder o lábio inferior.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 另一個自己，……因為背叛了哥哥和家人，還有溫柔地守望自己的親族們的心情，而讓自己咬著下唇。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 另一个自己，……因为背叛了哥哥和家人，还有温柔地守望自己的亲族们的心情，而让自己咬着下唇。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): D'altro canto... la sensazione che stesse tradendo il Fratello e la famiglia che avevano calorosamente vegliato su di lei le fece mordere il labbro inferiore.

Steam (ST): However, though she shook, she could do nothing but watch as her right hand slowly brought the key towards the lock.
Umineko Project (UP): However, though she shook, she could do nothing but watch as her right hand slowly brought the key towards the lock.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, though she shook, she could do nothing but watch as her right hand slowly brought the key towards the lock.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、震えながらも、ゆっくりと鍵を錠前に近付けていく右手に対しては、見守ることしか出来なかった。
Russian (RU): Но несмотря на то, что она дрогнула, ей оставалось только смотреть, как её правая рука медленно подносит ключ к замку.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No entanto, apesar de tremer, ela não pôde fazer nada além de observar a mão direita lentamente levar a chave à fechadura.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，對於顫抖著緩緩將鑰匙接近鎖的右手，就只能靜靜看著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，对于颤抖着缓缓将钥匙接近锁的右手，就只能静静看着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, quantunque vacillante, non poté far altro che stare a guardare mentre la sua mano destra lentamente avvicinava la chiave al lucchetto...

Steam (ST): Inside this diary is the final destination of my sad, painful, 12-year-long journey.
Umineko Project (UP): Inside this diary, there's the final destination of my sad, painful, twelve‐year‐long journey.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Inside this diary, there's the final destination of my sad, painful, 12-year-long journey.
PC Japanese (JP): この日記の中が、私の辛く悲しかった１２年の旅の終着点。
Russian (RU): В этом дневнике конечная остановка моего печального, мучительного, 12‐летнего путешествия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Dentro deste diário, está o destino final da minha triste e dolorosa jornada de doze anos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這日記之中，有著我辛酸悲痛的 12 年的旅行的終點。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这日记之中，有着我辛酸悲痛的 12 年的旅行的终点。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il contenuto di questo diario rappresenta la destinazione finale del mio triste, doloroso viaggio durato dodici anni.

Steam (ST): Wasn't 12 years enough? Do I want to keep living that way...?
Umineko Project (UP): Was twelve years not enough of that? Do I want to keep living that way...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Was 12 years not enough of that? Do I want to keep living that way...?
PC Japanese (JP): あの日々を、１２年で飽き足らず、まだ続けたいというの…？
Russian (RU): Разве 12 лет не было достаточно? Я хочу продолжать так жить?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Doze anos não foram suficientes? Então, eu quero continuar vivendo assim...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這樣的日子，12 年了還不厭倦，還想要繼續下去嗎…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这样的日子，12 年了还不厌倦，还想要继续下去吗…？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): dodici anni non sono stati più che sufficienti? Ho intenzione di continuare a vivere a quel modo...?

Steam (ST): That brother is an illusion created by my heart. ...My naive hope that a miracle might still occur.
Umineko Project (UP): That Onii‐chan, and all those others—those are all illusions created by my heart. ......My naive hope that a miracle might still occur.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That brother is an illusion created by my heart. ......My naive hope that a miracle might still occur.
PC Japanese (JP): あのお兄ちゃんたちは、私の心が生み出した幻。……奇跡を未だ期待する、甘え。
Russian (RU): Этот брат — иллюзия, созданная моим сердцем. ......Моя наивная надежда на то, что всё‐таки может случиться чудо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aquele onii‐chan, e todos os outros também — todos são ilusões criadas pelo meu coração. ......Minha ingênua esperança de que um milagre ainda possa ocorrer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 哥哥他們那些人，都是我心中產生的幻影。……還在期待奇跡的，天真。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 哥哥他们那些人，都是我心中产生的幻影。……还在期待奇迹的，天真。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quell'Onii-chan e i suoi amici sono un'illusione creata dal mio cuore. {n}Dalla mia ingenua speranza che un miracolo possa ancora accadere.

Steam (ST): If I put my two options on a scale, then the path I should choose is clear.
Umineko Project (UP): If I put my two options on a scale, then the path I should choose is clear.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If I put my two options on a scale, then the path I should choose is clear.
PC Japanese (JP): その二つを天秤に掛ければ、私が選ぶべき道は、一つしかない。
Russian (RU): Если взвесить два моих мнения, ясно, какой путь мне следует выбрать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se eu colocar minhas duas opções em uma balança, o caminho que devo escolher é claro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 將這兩者放在天平上稱的話，我應該選擇的道路，就只有一個。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 将这两者放在天平上称的话，我应该选择的道路，就只有一个。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se confronto le due alternative, il sentiero che devo percorrere non può che essere uno.

Steam (ST): Slowly, ...I pushed the key into the lock...and twisted...
Umineko Project (UP): Slowly, ......I pushed the key into the lock.........and twisted...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Slowly, ......I pushed the key into the lock......and twisted...
PC Japanese (JP): 私はゆっくりと……、錠前に鍵を挿し、………捻る…。
Russian (RU): Я медленно...... вставила ключ в замок...... и повернула...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Lentamente, ......eu empurrei a chave na fechadura.........e a girei...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我慢慢地……，將鑰匙插入鎖孔，………轉動…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我慢慢地……，将钥匙插入锁孔，………转动…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lentamente... spinsi la chiave nella serratura... e girai...

Steam (ST): The lock opened with a click, ...and at the same time, it felt as though a crack ran through the key in my hands.
Umineko Project (UP): The lock opened with a click, ......and at the same time, it felt as though a crack ran through the key in my hands.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The lock opened with a click, ......and at the same time, it felt as though a crack ran through the key in my hands.
PC Japanese (JP): 錠前はバチンと開き、……同時に、鍵に何かひびが入るような感触を感じた。
Russian (RU): Замок со щелчком отперся...... и в то же время показалось, что по ключу в моих руках пробежала трещина.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A fechadura se abriu com um clique e, ......ao mesmo tempo, pareceu que uma rachadura correu pela chave em minhas mãos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鎖叭嗒一聲打開，……同時，感覺到鑰匙上產生了裂痕的感觸。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 锁叭嗒一声打开，……同时，感觉到钥匙上产生了裂痕的感触。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il lucchetto si schiuse con un click... e in quello stesso momento, attraverso la chiave sentii come un qualcosa che si spezzava.

Steam (ST): Maybe a part of that intricate design had fallen off. I couldn't tell where it was broken just by glancing at it.
Umineko Project (UP): Maybe a part of its intricate design had broken off.{n}I couldn't tell where it had broken just by glancing at it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maybe a part of that intricate design had fallen off. I couldn't tell where it was broken just by glancing at it.
PC Japanese (JP): 鍵に施された複雑な意匠の一部が欠けたのだろうか。ぱっと見ただけでは、何が壊れたのか、わからない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 鍵に施された複雑な意匠の一部が欠けたのだろうか。{n}ぱっと見ただけでは、何が壊れたのか、わからない。
Russian (RU): Может, отвалилась часть его сложного дизайна.{n}С одного взгляда я не могла сказать, в каком месте он сломался.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez uma parte de seu intrincado design tenha quebrado.{n}Eu não poderia dizer onde ela tinha quebrado apenas olhando para ela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鑰匙上被施以的複雜的樣式的一部分缺掉了吧？{n}乍一看的話，到底是哪裡壞了，也看不出來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 钥匙上被施以的复杂的样式的一部分缺掉了吧？{n}乍一看的话，到底是哪里坏了，也看不出来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse una parte di quell'intricato design era caduta via. Non potevo dire dove si era rotta semplicemente guardandola di sfuggita.

Umineko Project (UP): However, for some reason, its golden glint seemed dulled somehow.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, for some reason, its golden glint seemed dulled somehow.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No entanto, por algum motivo, seu brilho dourado parecia ter ficado opaco de alguma forma.

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Eppure, si sentiva un leggero trambusto.

Steam (ST): In this world of suspended time, ...I could see dark shapes sneaking about in the shadows of the unmoving students.
Umineko Project (UP): In this world of suspended time, ......I could see dark shapes sneaking about behind the unmoving students.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In this world of suspended time, ......I could see dark shapes sneaking about in the shadows of the unmoving students.
PC Japanese (JP): 時間の止まった世界で、……時間の止まった生徒たちの陰で、黒い人影がこそこそと動くのが見える。
Russian (RU): В мире приостановленного времени...... я видела тёмные фигуры, которые крались в тенях неподвижных студенток.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Neste mundo de tempo suspenso, ......eu podia ver formas escuras se esgueirando por trás das estudantes imóveis.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從時間靜止的世界中，……時間靜止的學生們的影子中，可以看到黑色的人影在蠢蠢欲動。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从时间静止的世界中，……时间静止的学生们的影子中，可以看到黑色的人影在蠢蠢欲动。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In questo mondo in cui il tempo si era fermato... si potevano scorgere oscure sagome che si nascondevano tra gli studenti immobili.

Steam (ST): They were...students with goat heads.
Umineko Project (UP): They were.........students with goat heads.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They were......students with goat heads.
PC Japanese (JP): それは、………山羊の頭を持つ生徒。
Russian (RU): Фигуры студенток...... с козьими головами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Elas eram.........estudantes com cabeças de cabra.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那是，………有著山羊的頭的學生。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那是，………有着山羊的头的学生。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Esse erano... studenti con la testa di caprone.

Steam (ST): They were sneaking glances at me from behind the frozen students, whispering something to each other.
Umineko Project (UP): They were sneaking glances at me from behind the frozen students, whispering something to each other.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They were sneaking glances at me from behind the frozen students, whispering something to each other.
PC Japanese (JP): 時間の止まった生徒たちの陰から、こそこそと私を見ては、何かを囁きあっている。
Russian (RU): Они тайком смотрели на меня из‐за застывших студенток, что‐то шепча друг другу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Elas estavam me olhando furtivamente por trás dos estudantes congelados, sussurrando algo entre si.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從時間靜止的學生們的影子中，偷偷地看著我，嘴裡嘟囔著什麼。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从时间静止的学生们的影子中，偷偷地看着我，嘴里嘟囔着什么。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mi lanciavano degli sguardi furtivi da dietro gli studenti pietrificati, sussurrandosi qualcosa tra loro.

Steam (ST): I know. I can hear them.
Umineko Project (UP): I know. I can hear them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I know. I can hear them.
PC Japanese (JP): わかってる。聞こえてる。
Russian (RU): Я знаю. Я слышу их.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu sei. Eu posso ouvi‐las.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我知道。聽得到。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我知道。听得到。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Loro sanno. Li riesco a sentire.

Steam (ST): Everybody...everybody knows.
Umineko Project (UP): Everybody...everybody knows.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Everybody...everybody knows.
PC Japanese (JP): みんなみんな、わかってるんだから。
Russian (RU): Все, все знают.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Todo mundo...todo mundo sabe.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所有的人，都知道。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tutti... tutti loro sanno.

Steam (ST): One after another, students with goat heads grew out of shadows all over the room.
Umineko Project (UP): One after another, students with goat heads slipped out from every conceivable hiding place.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): One after another, students with goat heads grew out of shadows all over the room.
PC Japanese (JP): あちこちの物陰から、次々に山羊の頭の生徒たちが、生え出してくる。
Russian (RU): Студентки с козьими головами одна за другой выходили из теней и расходились по всему помещению.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Um após outro, estudantes com cabeças de cabra saíam de todos os esconderijos possíveis.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從各個地方的陰影裡，陸續產生出有著山羊頭的學生們。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从各个地方的阴影里，陆续产生出有着山羊头的学生们。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Uno dopo l'altro, gli studenti con le teste di caprone fecero capolino dall'oscurità qua e là per la stanza.

Steam (ST): They slipped around all the students stopped in time...and gathered around me.
Umineko Project (UP): They slipped around all the students stopped in time...and gathered around me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They slipped around all the students stopped in time...and gathered around me.
PC Japanese (JP): それらは、時間の止まった生徒たちの間を、ぬるりぬるりと抜け、私の周りに集まってくる。
Russian (RU): Они прошли мимо всех студенток, застывших во времени, и собрались вокруг меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles deslizaram ao redor de todos os estudantes parados no tempo...e se juntaram à minha volta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 它們慢慢穿過時間靜止的學生之間，聚集到我的周圍。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 它们慢慢穿过时间静止的学生之间，聚集到我的周围。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Essi scivolarono tra gli studenti pietrificati... e si riunirono attorno a me.

Steam (ST): Then, they all jeered out something in unison, and, as if they knew I could hear, showered me with giggles and gossip and sneers.
Umineko Project (UP): Then, they all jeered out things in an endless stream, and, possibly aware that I could hear, showered me with giggles and sneers and comments amongst themselves.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then, they all jeered out something in unison, and, possibly aware that I could hear, showered me with giggles and gossip and sneers.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、口々に何かを囃し立て、あるいは聞こえているのを承知で、くすくすと陰口と嘲笑を浴びせてくるのだ。
Russian (RU): Потом что‐то высмеяли в унисон и зная, что я слышу, осыпали меня хихиканьем, сплетнями и насмешками.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, todos escarneceram das coisas em um fluxo interminável e, possivelmente cientes de que eu podia ouvir, me encheram com risos, zombarias e comentários entre si.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，嘴裡嘲笑著什麼，或者是知道我能夠聽得到，而呵呵地說著壞話嘲笑我。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，嘴里嘲笑着什么，或者是知道我能够听得到，而呵呵地说着坏话嘲笑我。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi proferirono all'unisono parole di dileggio nei miei confronti, per poi, pienamente coscienti del fatto che potessi sentirli, riempirmi di risatine, sorrisi beffardi e velenosi commenti.

Steam (ST): However, nothing that came from the goats' mouths reached my ears as words.
Umineko Project (UP): However, nothing that came from the goats' mouths reached my ears as words.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, nothing that came from the goats' mouths reached my ears as words.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、山羊たちの口から発せられる言葉は、言葉としては耳に届かない。
Russian (RU): Но ничего из того, что вышло из ртов козлоголовых, не дошло до моих ушей словами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No entanto, nada que saiu da boca das cabras chegou aos meus ouvidos como palavras.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，從山羊們的口中說出的話語，沒有作為言語傳到我耳中。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，从山羊们的口中说出的话语，没有作为言语传到我耳中。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Però, niente di quello che usciva dalle bocche dei caproni raggiungeva le mie orecchie.

Steam (ST): This was a world without letters or words, ...so no words reached me.
Umineko Project (UP): This was a world without letters or words, ......so no words reached me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This was a world without letters or words, ......so no words reached me.
PC Japanese (JP): ここは、文字も言葉もない世界だから、……言葉としては耳に届かない。
Russian (RU): Мы были в мире без букв и слов...... поэтому слова не достигли меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Este era um mundo sem letras ou palavras, ......por isso nenhuma palavra me alcançou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為，這裡是沒有文字和語言的世界，……語言是傳不到耳中的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为，这里是没有文字和语言的世界，……语言是传不到耳中的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questo era un mondo senza lettere e parole... così nessuna parola mi raggiungeva.

Steam (ST): However, their emotions and meanings did reach me.
Umineko Project (UP): However, their emotions and meanings did reach me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, their emotions and meanings did reach me.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、感情と意味は、届く。
Russian (RU): Но до меня дошли их эмоции и значение.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No entanto, suas emoções e significados me atingiram.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，感情和意義，傳得到。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，感情和意义，传得到。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, le loro emozioni e i loro significati sì che mi raggiungevano.

Steam (ST): So, I knew what it was they were saying.
Umineko Project (UP): So, I knew what it was they were saying.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So, I knew what it was they were saying.
PC Japanese (JP): だから彼らが何を言っているのか、縁寿にはわかるのだ。
Russian (RU): Поэтому я знала, что они говорили.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Logo, eu sabia o que eles estavam dizendo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以它們在說什麼，緣壽是知道的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以它们在说什么，缘寿是知道的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi, sapevo cosa stavano dicendo.

Steam (ST): And then, when I was able to visualize it...
Umineko Project (UP): And then, when I was able to visualize it, .........this happened...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And then, when I was able to visualize it, ......this happened...
PC Japanese (JP): そして、それを視覚化したら、………こうなった。
Russian (RU): И когда я смогла представить......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E então, quando eu pude visualizar, .........isso aconteceu...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 並且，將之視覺化之後，………就成了這樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 并且，将之视觉化之后，………就成了这样。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Così, quando fui in grado di visualizzarlo... accadde quanto segue...

Steam (ST): One after another, the goats opened their massive jaws, showing their fangs that dripped with saliva, ...and came forward to bite me.
Umineko Project (UP): One after another, the goats opened their massive jaws, showing their fangs that dripped with saliva, ......and came forward to bite me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): One after another, the goats opened their massive jaws, showing their fangs that dripped with saliva, ......and came forward to bite me.
PC Japanese (JP): 山羊たちは次々に、大きな顎を開き、涎を滴らせた牙を覗かせながら、……私にかじりついてくるのだ。
Russian (RU): Козлорогие один за другим раскрыли свои огромные челюсти, выставляя клыки с капающей слюной...... и вышли вперёд, чтобы укусить меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Uma após a outra, as cabras abriam suas mandíbulas enormes, mostrando suas presas que pingavam saliva, ......e avançaram para me morder.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 山羊們陸續地，張開大口，讓我看到那牙間滴下來的口水，……向我啃過來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 山羊们陆续地，张开大口，让我看到那牙间滴下来的口水，……向我啃过来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Uno dopo l'altro, i caproni aprirono le loro possenti mascelle mostrando le loro zanne gocciolanti di saliva... e avanzarono verso di me per mordermi.

Steam (ST): Time was stopped for me. I was aware, but I could not move.
Umineko Project (UP): Time was stopped for me.{n}I was aware, but I could not move.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Time was stopped for me. I was aware, but I could not move.
PC Japanese (JP): 私の時間は、止まっている。意識はあっても、身動きは出来ない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 私の時間は、止まっている。{n}意識はあっても、身動きは出来ない。
Russian (RU): Время остановилось для меня.{n}Я знала, но не могла двигаться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O tempo parou para mim.{n}Eu estava consciente, mas não conseguia me mexer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我的時間也，靜止著。{n}就算有意識，身體也動不了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我的时间也，静止着。{n}就算有意识，身体也动不了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il tempo per me si era fermato. Ero cosciente, ma non potevo muovermi.

Steam (ST): ...That wasn't literally true.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Literally, that wasn't true.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……本当は出来る。
Russian (RU): ......Буквально это было не так.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Literalmente, não era verdade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……其實是能動的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……其实是能动的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... In verità, potevo.

Steam (ST): However, I was pretending that I couldn't hear, ...so I couldn't move.
Umineko Project (UP): However, I was pretending that I couldn't hear, ......so I couldn't move.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, I was pretending that I couldn't hear, ......so I couldn't move.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、聞こえてないふりをしているから、……動けない。
Russian (RU): Но я притворялась, что не слышу...... и поэтому не смогла двинуться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No entanto, eu estava fingindo que não podia ouvir, ......por isso eu não podia me mover.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，因為裝作沒聽到，……所以動不了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，因为装作没听到，……所以动不了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma stavo fingendo di non sentire... quindi non potevo muovermi.

Steam (ST): The goats bit me all over my body, leaving their fang marks, licking me.
Umineko Project (UP): The goats bit me all over my body, leaving their fang marks, licking me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The goats bit me all over my body, leaving their fang marks, licking me.
PC Japanese (JP): 山羊たちは、私の体中の思い思いの場所にかぶりつき、歯形を付けたり、嘗め回したりする。
Russian (RU): Козлорогие лизали и кусали меня по всему телу, оставляя следы от клыков.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As cabras me morderam por todo o corpo, deixando marcas de presas, me lambendo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 山羊們肆意啃咬我的身體，留下齒印，或是舔來舔去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 山羊们肆意啃咬我的身体，留下齿印，或是舔来舔去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): I caproni mi morsero su tutto il corpo, leccandomi, e lasciandomi i segni delle loro zanne.

Steam (ST): Maybe they didn't like the taste of my clothes.
Umineko Project (UP): Maybe they didn't like the taste of my clothes.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maybe they didn't like the taste of my clothes.
PC Japanese (JP): 衣服の歯触りがイラつくのだろうか。
Russian (RU): Может, им не нравился вкус моей одежды.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez elas não apreciassem o gosto das minhas roupas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 大概是對衣服的觸感覺得不爽吧？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 大概是对衣服的触感觉得不爽吧？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse non gradivano il sapore dei miei vestiti.

Steam (ST): Taking advantage of the fact that I couldn't move, ...they chewed through my clothes one by one.
Umineko Project (UP): Taking advantage of the fact that I couldn't move, ......they chewed through my clothes one by one.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Taking advantage of the fact that I couldn't move, ......they chewed through my clothes one by one.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼らは私の身動きが出来ないのをいいことに、……次々に衣服を噛み千切っていく。
Russian (RU): Воспользовавшись тем, что я не могу двигаться...... они прожевали мою одежду.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aproveitando o fato de que eu não conseguia me mexer, ......eles mastigaram minhas peças de roupa uma a uma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 它們趁我身體不能動，……陸續把衣服給撕碎。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 它们趁我身体不能动，……陆续把衣服给撕碎。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Approfittando del fatto che non riuscivo a muovermi... si fecero strada a morsi attraverso i miei vestiti uno per uno.

Steam (ST): Over and over again, ...the goats stuck their tongues, their jaws, their fangs into my naked body.
Umineko Project (UP): Over and over again, ......the goats stuck their tongues, their jaws, their fangs into my naked body.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Over and over again, ......the goats stuck their tongues, their jaws, their fangs into my naked body.
PC Japanese (JP): 剥き出しにされた私の体に、……山羊たちは次々に、舌を、顎を、牙を突き立てる。
Russian (RU): Снова и снова...... козлоголовые впивались языками, челюстями и клыками в моё голое тело.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): De novo e de novo, ......as cabras estenderam suas línguas, suas mandíbulas e suas presas em meu corpo nu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被剝光的我的身體上，……山羊們一個個地，將舌頭和牙靠了上去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 被剥光的我的身体上，……山羊们一个个地，将舌头和牙靠了上去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In continuazione, senza fermarsi... i caproni infilarono le loro lingue, le loro mascelle, le loro zanne nel mio corpo nudo.

Steam (ST): I was covered with drool and bitten all over.
Umineko Project (UP): I was covered with drool and bitten all over.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I was covered with drool and bitten all over.
PC Japanese (JP): 涎まみれにされ、噛み回され。
Russian (RU): Я вся была в слюне и укусах.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu estava coberta com a baba delas e toda mordida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被四處舔食，四處啃咬。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 被四处舔食，四处啃咬。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ero ricoperta di bava e morsa dappertutto.

Steam (ST): Bright red teeth marks were left behind as sharp fangs pierced my skin, leaving trails of blood.
Umineko Project (UP): Bright red teeth marks were left behind as sharp fangs pierced my skin, leaving trails of blood.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Bright red teeth marks were left behind as sharp fangs pierced my skin, leaving trails of blood.
PC Japanese (JP): 真っ赤な歯型が残って、鋭い牙は皮を突き破って、血を滴らせた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 真っ赤な歯形が残って、鋭い牙は皮を突き破って、血を滴らせた。
Russian (RU): Когда острые клыки пронзали мою кожу, оставались ярко‐красные следы от зубов, оставляющие кровавые следы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Marcas de dentes escarlates foram deixadas para trás, enquanto presas afiadas perfuravam minha pele, deixando rastros de sangue.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 留下鮮紅的牙印，尖銳的牙咬破皮膚，滴出了血。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 留下鲜红的牙印，尖锐的牙咬破皮肤，滴出了血。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Zanne affilate si conficcavano nella mia pelle lasciando dentate di un rosso acceso, assieme a scie di sangue.

Steam (ST): They licked up that blood like real goats, ...hurting and humiliating me.
Umineko Project (UP): They licked up that blood like real goats, ......hurting and humiliating me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They licked up that blood like real goats, ......hurting and humiliating me.
PC Japanese (JP): その血を本当の山羊のように、べろべろと舐め取り、……私を傷つける。辱める。
Russian (RU): Они лизали кровь как настоящие козлы...... мучая и унижая меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Elas lambiam aquele sangue como cabras de verdade, ......me machucando e me humilhando.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 將這些血像真正的山羊那樣，用舌頭舔掉，……傷害我。侮辱我。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 将这些血像真正的山羊那样，用舌头舔掉，……伤害我。侮辱我。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Assaporavano con la lingua quel sangue come dei veri e propri caproni... ferendomi e umiliandomi.

Steam (ST): As I hung my head, one of the goats pulled on my hair, forcing me to look up, and spoke.
Umineko Project (UP): As I hung my head, one of the goats pulled on my hair, forcing me to look up, and spoke.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As I hung my head, one of the goats pulled on my hair, forcing me to look up, and spoke.
PC Japanese (JP): 山羊の一人が、俯く私の髪を引っ張り上げ、無理やり上を向かせてから、私に言う。
Russian (RU): Когда я опустила голову, один из козлоголовых потянул меня за волосы, вынудив поднять взгляд, и заговорил.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando baixei a cabeça, uma das cabras puxou meu cabelo, me forçando a olhar para cima, e falou comigo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 山羊中的一人，抓著低著頭的我的頭髮，強迫我抬頭，對我說著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 山羊中的一人，抓着低着头的我的头发，强迫我抬头，对我说着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mentre ero a testa china, uno dei caproni me la alzò, forzandomi a guardare in alto, quindi mi parlò.

Steam (ST): They didn't say it with concepts, but with words I could hear.
Umineko Project (UP): This time, it wasn't conceptual, but words I could hear.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It wasn't with a direct concept, but with words I could hear.
PC Japanese (JP): それは概念ではなく、耳に聞こえる、言葉だった。

Original Witch Hunt (OG): Looking down from Bernkastel's balcony, which was as high as a skyscraper's roof, ......could it have looked like a lovely, red pressed flower?
PC Japanese (JP): それを、あのビルの屋上のような高さにあるベルンカステルのバルコニーから見下ろしたなら、……それは美しい、真っ赤な押し花に見えただろうか。
Russian (RU): Если посмотреть вниз с балкона {f:5:Бернкастель}, который располагался столь же высоко, как крыша небоскрёба...... это могло бы напомнить красивый, красный засушенный цветок?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Olhando da varanda de {f:5:Bernkastel}, que era tão alta quanto o telhado de um arranha‐céu, ......poderia parecer uma linda flor vermelha pressionada contra o solo?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那從和那座大樓的屋頂一般高的貝倫卡斯泰露的露台往下看的話，……會看到朵美麗的，鮮紅的印花吧？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那从和那座大楼的屋顶一般高的贝伦卡斯泰露的露台往下看的话，……会看到朵美丽的，鲜红的印花吧？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Guardando giù dalla balconata di Bernkastel, che era situata in alto allo stesso modo del tetto di un grattacielo... non si potrebbe paragonare ad un amabile, fiore rosso sangue pressato?

Steam (ST): No. You couldn't see it at all.
Umineko Project (UP): It couldn't have looked like anything.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 見えまい。何も。
Russian (RU): Это ни на что не было похоже.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não, poderia ter parecido com qualquer coisa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看不到。什麼都。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看不到。什么都。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Di sicuro non era paragonabile ad alcunché.

Steam (ST): Just like how the death of a single lonely girl who rejected the world...didn't matter to anyone in the world.
Umineko Project (UP): In the same way that the death of a single lonely girl who rejected the world and died alone......wouldn't leave an impression on any of the world's people.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Just like how the death of a single lonely girl who rejected the world......didn't matter to anyone in the world.
PC Japanese (JP): 世界を拒否してたった一人死んだ、孤独な少女の死など、……世界の誰も、気に留めないように。
Russian (RU): Точно так же, как смерть одинокой девушки, отвергнувшей мир...... ни для кого в мире не имела значения.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Da mesma maneira que a morte de uma única garota solitária que rejeitou o mundo e morreu sozinha......isso não deixaria uma impressão em nenhuma das pessoas do mundo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 拒絕世界獨自死亡的，孤獨的少女的死，……這世界中的任何人，都不會注意到。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 拒绝世界独自死亡的，孤独的少女的死，……这世界中的任何人，都不会注意到。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Allo stesso modo di come la vita di una singola solitaria ragazza che aveva respinto il mondo... non importava a nessuno al mondo.

Steam (ST): She probably died instantly.
Umineko Project (UP): She probably died instantly.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She probably died instantly.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女は、即死だったろう。
Russian (RU): Она, вероятно, умерла мгновенно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela provavelmente morreu instantaneamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她是，即死吧？
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Probabilmente morì all'istante.

Steam (ST): It was only natural. She had fallen straight down from this height, after all.
Umineko Project (UP): It was only natural. She had fallen straight down from such a height, after all.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was only natural. She had fallen straight down from this height, after all.
PC Japanese (JP): 当然だ。あの高さより、まっすぐに墜落したのだから。
Russian (RU): Ничего удивительного. Ведь она упала прямо вниз с такой высоты.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É algo natural. Afinal, ela caiu de cabeça de tal altura.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是當然。從那麼高的地方，筆直墜落下來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是当然。从那么高的地方，笔直坠落下来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era naturale. Era caduta giù da una tale altezza, dopotutto.

Steam (ST): ...Is it even conceivable that she wouldn't die instantly after something like that?
Umineko Project (UP): ......Is it even conceivable that she wouldn't die instantly after something like that?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Is it even conceivable that she wouldn't die instantly after something like that?
PC Japanese (JP): ……その彼女が、即死でなかったなんて、想像できるだろうか？
Russian (RU): ......Могла ли она после такого не умереть мгновенно?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......É concebível que ela não morra instantaneamente depois de algo assim?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這樣的她，不是即死的情況，能想像得出來嗎？
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这样的她，不是即死的情况，能想象得出来吗？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Si può mai arrivare a pensare che dopo una cosa del genere non sia morta istantaneamente?

Steam (ST): The index finger on the right hand of her corpse stuck out, as though it was tracing something.
Umineko Project (UP): The index finger on the right hand of her corpse was stuck out as though it had traced something.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The index finger on the right hand of her corpse stuck out, as though it was tracing something.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女の死体は、何かをなぞったかのように右手の人差し指を突き立てていた。
Russian (RU): Указательный палец правой руки её трупа торчал так, будто что‐то прослеживал.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O dedo indicador na mão direita do seu cadáver estava esticado, como se tivesse traçado algo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她的屍體，像是要描繪什麼一樣，右手的食指向前伸著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她的尸体，像是要描绘什么一样，右手的食指向前伸着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il dito indice della mano destra del suo cadavere spiccava come se lo avesse usato per scrivere qualcosa.

Steam (ST): Could it be that, by some impossible miracle, she really had escaped an instant death?
Umineko Project (UP): Could it be that, by some impossible miracle, she really had escaped an instant death?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Could it be that, by some impossible miracle, she really had escaped an instant death?
PC Japanese (JP): まさか、億分の一の奇跡が起こって、彼女は本当に、即死だけは免れたのだろうか。
Russian (RU): Неужели она и вправду невозможным чудом избежала мгновенной смерти?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Será que, por algum milagre impossível, ela realmente tenha escapado de uma morte instantânea?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如果說，能發生億分之一的奇跡，她真的能夠，免於即死吧？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如果说，能发生亿分之一的奇迹，她真的能够，免于即死吧？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Che, per qualche inverosimile miracolo, avesse per davvero fuggito una morte istantanea?

Steam (ST): And could the red blood that had drained from her at the moment of her death...have been the ink that drew her own personal red truth?
Umineko Project (UP): And in her final moments, ......using the ink of the red blood draining from her, could she possibly have written her own personal red truth?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And could the red blood that had drained from her on the moment of her death...have been the ink that drew her own personal red truth?
PC Japanese (JP): そして死の際に、……自分の内より溢れ出る真っ赤な血をインクに、自分だけの赤き真実を記したのだろうか。
Russian (RU): И могла ли красная кровь, которая вылилась из неё в момент смерти... быть чернилами, написавшими её личную красную правду?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E, será que em seus momentos finais, ......usando a tinta do sangue vermelho que estava sendo drenado do seu corpo, ela poderia ter escrito sua própria verdade vermelha pessoal?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後在死前，……會用自己體內溢出的鮮紅的血當做墨水，來記述只屬於自己的紅色真實吧？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后在死前，……会用自己体内溢出的鲜红的血当做墨水，来记述只属于自己的红色真实吧？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E... possible che il sangue rosso che era fuoriuscito dal suo corpo nel momento della morte... fosse stato l'inchiostro col quale scrivere la propria personale verità rossa?

Steam (ST): However, no one would ever be able to tell what she had written.
Umineko Project (UP): However, no one would ever be able to tell what she had written.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、何を記したのか、もう誰にもわからない。
Russian (RU): Но никто никогда не узнает, что она написала.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No entanto, ninguém seria capaz de dizer o que teria sido escrito.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，她寫下了什麼，誰都不知道。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，她写下了什么，谁都不知道。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ad ogni modo, non si poteva sapere cosa aveva scritto.

Steam (ST): After all, ...the red blood pouring from her corpse had run over it all.
Umineko Project (UP): After all, ......the red blood pouring from her corpse had run over it all.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After all, ......the red blood pouring from her corpse had run over it all.
PC Japanese (JP): だって、……彼女の死体より溢れ出る真っ赤な血が、それを飲み込んでしまったから。
Russian (RU): В конце концов...... всё это размыла красная кровь, льющаяся из её трупа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Afinal, ......a mancha de sangue derramando a partir do seu cadáver se espalhava ao redor.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為，……從她的屍體溢出的鮮紅的血，會將其淹沒覆蓋。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为，……从她的尸体溢出的鲜红的血，会将其淹没覆盖。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Del resto... il sangue rosso che veniva versato dal suo corpo senza vita, era sparso dappertutto.

Steam (ST): "......Even this...was one of your choices, ...Ange."
Umineko Project (UP): "............Even this...was your decision, .........Ange."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........Even this...is a choice for you to make. ......Ange."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………それさえも、あんたの選択よ。………縁寿。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………それさえも、あんたの選択よ。………縁寿」
Russian (RU): ".........Это тоже... твой выбор...... Энджи."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............Até mesmo isso...foi sua decisão, .........Ange."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………就算是這樣，這也是你的選擇喲。………緣壽。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………就算是这样，这也是你的选择哟。………缘寿。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Perfino questa... è una tua scelta. ... Ange."

Steam (ST): {f:5:Eva} was looking down at the beautiful flower of blood radiating from Ange's corpse.
Umineko Project (UP): {f:5:Eva} was looking down at the beautiful flower of blood radiating from Ange's corpse.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): EVA was looking down at the beautiful flower of blood radiating from Ange's corpse.
PC Japanese (JP): 美しく、放射状に血の花を開いた縁寿の死体を、エヴァは見下ろしている。
Russian (RU): {f:5:Ева} смотрела вниз на прекрасный кровавый цветок, расходящийся из‐под трупа Энджи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {f:5:Eva} estava olhando para a bela flor de sangue que irradiava do cadáver de Ange.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 夏娃低頭看著，美麗的，綻放著放射線形血之花的緣壽的屍體。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 夏娃低头看着，美丽的，绽放着放射线形血之花的缘寿的尸体。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): EVA osservava dall'alto il bellissimo fiore di sangue che si diramava dal cadavere di Ange.

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "...I tried to keep you alive. ...However, you never tried to live in the future that began after the age of six. ...And so, after 12 years, you've finally returned to where you started."
Umineko Project (UP): "......I tried to give you a chance to live. ......But you never truly made an effort to live in the future that began after the age of six. .........And so, after twelve years, you've finally returned to where you started."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......I tried to give you a chance to live. ......However, you didn't truly make an effort to live in the future that began after the age of six. ......And so, after 12 years, you've finally returned to where you started."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……私は、あんたを生かそうとした。……でもあんたは、６歳より先の未来を、生きようとしなかった。………だからあんたは１２年を掛けて、やっと、元の場所に戻ってきた。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……私は、あんたを生かそうとした。……でもあんたは、６歳より先の未来を、生きようとしなかった。………だからあんたは１２年を掛けて、やっと、元の場所に戻ってきた」
Russian (RU): "......Я попыталась дать тебе шанс жить. ......Но ты так и не приложила усилий, чтобы жить в будущем, начавшемся после шести лет. ......И вот, спустя 12 лет ты наконец вернулась к тому, с чего начала."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Eu tentei lhe dar uma chance de viver. ......Mas você nunca fez um esforço para viver no futuro que começou após seus seis anos de idade. .........E assim, depois de doze anos, você finalmente voltou ao lugar onde as coisas começaram."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……我是想要讓你活下去的。……但是你，並不打算活在 6 歲之後的未來。………所以你歷經了 12 年，總算，回到了原本的地方。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……我是想要让你活下去的。……但是你，并不打算活在 6 岁之后的未来。………所以你历经了 12 年，总算，回到了原本的地方。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Provai a darti un'opportunità di vita. ... Però, non facesti un sincero sforzo di vivere il futuro che avevi davanti a te all'età di sei anni. ... E così, dopo dodici anni, sei infine tornata al punto di partenza."

Steam (ST): The eyes on Ange's corpse...were closed.
Umineko Project (UP): The eyes on Ange's corpse...were closed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 縁寿の死体の目は、閉じられている。
Russian (RU): Глаза на трупе Энджи... были закрыты.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os olhos no cadáver de Ange...estavam fechados.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 緣壽的屍體的眼睛，是閉上的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 缘寿的尸体的眼睛，是闭上的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gli occhi del corpo di Ange... erano chiusi.

Steam (ST): ...However, there was no way of knowing if this was a peaceful thing.
Umineko Project (UP): ......However, there was no way of knowing if this was a peaceful thing.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし、それが安らかなものに見えるかどうかは、わからなかった。
Russian (RU): ......Но нельзя было узнать, был ли в них покой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......No entanto, não havia como saber se isso era algo pacífico.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……但是，那看起來是否安詳，無人知曉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……但是，那看起来是否安详，无人知晓。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Tuttavia, non c'era modo di sapere se fosse una cosa pacifica.

Steam (ST): Eventually, the corpse began to melt away.
Umineko Project (UP): Slowly, the corpse began to break down.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Eventually, the corpse began to melt away.
PC Japanese (JP): やがて、死体は、ぐずぐずと解けていく。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): やがて、死体は、ぐずぐずととけていく。
Russian (RU): В конце концов труп начал таять.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Lentamente, o cadáver começou a se desfazer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 之後，屍體慢慢開始分解。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 之后，尸体慢慢开始分解。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Infine, il cadavere andò sciogliendosi.

Steam (ST): At the end, it had become a messy lump of flesh, with only a few parts recognizable as human.
Umineko Project (UP): By the end, it had become a messy lump of flesh, with only a few parts recognizable as human.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At the end, it had become a messy lump of flesh, with only a few parts recognizable as human.
PC Japanese (JP): 最後には、人間として認識できるいくつかの部分のみを残した、ぐちゃぐちゃの肉塊に変わり果てる。
Russian (RU): В итоге он стал грязным комом плоти, и только некоторые части можно было признать за человеческие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No final, tornou‐se uma confusa massa de carne, com apenas algumas partes reconhecíveis como humanas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 最後會變成，僅剩下幾個能辨認出是人類的部分，變成黏糊糊的肉塊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 最后会变成，仅剩下几个能辨认出是人类的部分，变成黏糊糊的肉块。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo un po' si era trasformato in un ammasso disordinato di carne, con solo poche parti riconoscibili come umane.

Steam (ST): ...It was hardly surprising.
Umineko Project (UP): ......It was hardly surprising.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……無理もない。
Russian (RU): ......Неудивительно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Não era surpreendente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這也不奇怪。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这也不奇怪。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non c'era niente di sorprendente in ciò.

Steam (ST): How else would she look after falling from that height...and slamming against the asphalt?
Umineko Project (UP): How else would she look after falling from that height......and slamming against the asphalt?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): How else would she look after falling from that height......and slamming against the asphalt?
PC Japanese (JP): あの高さからまっすぐに落ちて、アスファルトに叩きつけられたのだから、……それは当然の姿だった。
Russian (RU): Как ещё она могла выглядеть после того, как упала с такой высоты...... и ударилась об асфальт?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): De que outra forma ela pareceria depois de cair daquela altura......e então chocando‐se contra o asfalto?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為是從那麼高的地方筆直落下，砸在柏油路上，……這是理所應當的樣子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为是从那么高的地方笔直落下，砸在柏油路上，……这是理所应当的样子。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Che altro aspetto avrebbe dovuto avere dopo essere caduta da quell'altezza... ed essersi schiantata contro l'asfalto?

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "You managed to die. ...However, this doesn't mean that everyone will be waiting for you in heaven. ...After all, you reached this place by rejecting all of those in heaven. ...<See you in hell.> No, that's probably where we are right now. ...So long, Ange."
Umineko Project (UP): "You managed to die. ......However, this doesn't mean that everyone will be waiting for you in heaven. ......After all, you reached this place by rejecting all of those in heaven. .........<See you in hell>. No, that's probably where we are right now. .........So long, Ange."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "You managed to die. ......However, this doesn't mean that everyone will be waiting for you in heaven. ......After all, you reached this place by rejecting all of those in heaven. ......<See you in hell>. No, that's probably where we are right now. ......So long, Ange."
PC Japanese (JP): 「あんたは死ねたわ。……でもね。それで天国のみんなに迎えてもらえるかは別だわ。……だってあんたは、その天国のみんなを拒絶して、ここへ来たんじゃない。………シーユーヘル。いいえ、多分それはここだったわね。………さようなら、縁寿。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あんたは死ねたわ。……でもね。それで天国のみんなに迎えてもらえるかは別だわ。……だってあんたは、その天国のみんなを拒絶して、ここへ来たんじゃない。………シーユーヘル。いいえ、多分それはここだったわね。………さようなら、縁寿」
Russian (RU): "Тебе удалось умереть. ......И всё же, это не значит, что все будут ждать тебя на небесах. ......Ведь ты предпочла отвергнуть всех тех, кто на небе. ......See you in hell. Хотя, может, мы уже там. ......Прощай, Энджи."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você conseguiu morrer. ......No entanto, isso não significa que todos estarão esperando por você no céu. ......Afinal, você chegou a esse lugar rejeitando todos os que estão no céu. .........{i:See you in hell}. Não, provavelmente é onde estamos agora. .........Adeus, Ange."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「你是死了。……但是呢。這不代表在天國的大家會來迎接你。……因為你不是，拒絕了在天國的大家，來了這裡嘛？………See you hell. 不，大概那就是這裡了呢。………永別了，緣壽。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你是死了。……但是呢。这不代表在天国的大家会来迎接你。……因为你不是，拒绝了在天国的大家，来了这里嘛？………See you hell. 不，大概那就是这里了呢。………永别了，缘寿。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sei riuscita a morire. ... Eppure, ciò non vuol dire che tutti ti staranno aspettando in Paradiso. ... Dopotutto, hai raggiunto questo posto proprio rigettando quei tutti che sono in Paradiso. ... See you in hell. No, quello è probabilmente dove siamo ora. ... Addio, Ange."

Speaker: {f:5:Bernkastel}
Steam (ST): "Ah, {f:5:Eva}. Perfect timing."
Umineko Project (UP): "Ah, {f:5:Eva}. Perfect timing."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Ah, EVA. Perfect timing."
PC Japanese (JP): 「あら、エヴァ。ちょうど良いところへ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あら、エヴァ。ちょうど良いところへ」
Russian (RU): "О, {f:5:Ева}. Как раз вовремя."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ah, {f:5:Eva}? Bem na hora."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「啊啦，夏娃。來得正好。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「啊啦，夏娃。来得正好。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ah, EVA. Tempismo perfetto."

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "Did you call for me, my master?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Did you call for me, my master?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「お呼びでしょうか、我が主。」
Russian (RU): "Вы меня звали, госпожа?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você me chamou, minha mentora?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「您叫我嗎，我主？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「您叫我吗，我主？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Mi ha chiamata, mia signora?"

Speaker: {f:5:Bernkastel}
Steam (ST): "Clean up this scrap meat for me, if you wouldn't mind. I'm going to take this back."
Umineko Project (UP): "Dispose of this scrap meat for me, if you wouldn't mind. I'm going to put this back."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Clean up this scrap meat for me, if you wouldn't mind. I'm going to put this back."
PC Japanese (JP): 「その挽き肉のゴミを捨てておいてちょうだい。私はこれを戻してくるわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「その挽き肉のゴミを捨てておいてちょうだい。私はこれを戻してくるわ」
Russian (RU): "Убери этот кусок мяса, если не возражаешь. Я отнесу книгу."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Descarte esse lixo de carne moída, se você não se importar. Vou colocar isso de volta."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「把那堆肉餡垃圾給扔了吧？我要把這個送回去。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「把那堆肉馅垃圾给扔了吧？我要把这个送回去。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Pulisci via quest'ammasso di brandelli di carne per me, se non ti dispiace. {n}Vado a riportare questo e torno."

Steam (ST): In {f:5:Bernkastel}'s hands were the key, which had lost its magic when Ange made her decision, and the Book of the Single Truth, which had been locked up again.
Umineko Project (UP): In {f:5:Bernkastel}'s hands was the key, which had lost its magic when Ange had made her decision, and the Book of the Single Truth, which had been locked up again.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In Bernkastel's hands was the key, which had lost its magic when Ange had made her decision, and the Book of the Single Truth, which had been locked up again.
PC Japanese (JP): ベルンカステルの手には、縁寿が選択を終えて魔法を失った鍵と、再び施錠された一なる真実の書があった。
Russian (RU): В руках {f:5:Бернкастель} был ключ, утративший свою магию, когда Энджи приняла решение, и снова запертая книга единственной правды.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nas mãos de {f:5:Bernkastel} estava a chave, que havia perdido a magia quando Ange tomou sua decisão, e o Livro da Única Verdade, que havia sido trancado novamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 貝倫卡斯泰露的手中，是緣壽選擇後失去了魔法的鑰匙和，再次被上鎖的唯一真實之書。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 贝伦卡斯泰露的手中，是缘寿选择后失去了魔法的钥匙和，再次被上锁的唯一真实之书。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nelle mani di Bernkastel c'era la chiave, che aveva perso la sua magia quando Ange prese la sua decisione, e il Libro dell'Unica Verità, che era stato chiuso nuovamente.

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "As you wish, my master."
Umineko Project (UP): "As you wish, my master."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「畏まりました、我が主。」
Russian (RU): "Как прикажете, госпожа."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Como desejar, minha mentora."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「遵命，我主。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Come desidera, mia signora."

Steam (ST): After looking down one more time, {f:5:Bernkastel} vanished.
Umineko Project (UP): After looking down one more time, {f:5:Bernkastel} vanished.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After looking down one more time, Bernkastel vanished.
PC Japanese (JP): ベルンカステルは、もう一度眼下を見やってから、その姿を消す。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ベルンカステルは、もう一度眼下を見やってから、その姿を消す。
Russian (RU): Ещё раз взглянув вниз, {f:5:Бернкастель} исчезла.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois de olhar para baixo mais uma vez, {f:5:Bernkastel} desapareceu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 貝倫卡斯泰露又看了一眼下面，消失了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 贝伦卡斯泰露又看了一眼下面，消失了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo aver guardato giù un'altra volta, Bernkastel svanì.

Steam (ST): Once she had gone, {f:5:Eva} summoned some cat familiars and ordered them to clean up.
Umineko Project (UP): Once she had gone, {f:5:Eva} summoned some cat familiars and ordered them to clean up.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Once she had gone, EVA summoned some cat familiars and ordered them to clean up.
PC Japanese (JP): それを見送ってから、エヴァは使い魔の猫たちを呼び出し、片付けを命じるのだった。
Russian (RU): Как только она пропала, ведьма Ева призвала кошачьих приспешников и приказала им прибраться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando ela se foi, {f:5:Eva} convocou alguns familiares‐gato e ordenou que fizessem a limpeza.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 目送她消失後，夏娃召出貓咪使魔們，命令它們打掃。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 目送她消失后，夏娃召出猫咪使魔们，命令它们打扫。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Una volta che fu via, EVA richiamò alcuni famigli gatto e ordinò loro di ripulire.

Steam (ST): The black cats gathered Ange's flesh and scattered limbs and threw them into a tin bucket.
Umineko Project (UP): The black cats gathered Ange's flesh and scattered limbs and threw them into a tin bucket.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The black cats gathered Ange's flesh and scattered limbs and threw them into a tin bucket.
PC Japanese (JP): 黒猫たちは、縁寿の肉塊とばらばらの手足を集め、ブリキのバケツに放り込む。
Russian (RU): Чёрные кошки собрали плоть Энджи вместе с разбросанными конечностями и бросили их в оловянные вёдра.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os gatos pretos juntaram a carne e os membros dispersos de Ange e os jogaram em um balde de flandre.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黑貓們，將和肉塊分散開的手腳收集到一起，放入鐵皮水桶裡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黑猫们，将和肉块分散开的手脚收集到一起，放入铁皮水桶里。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): I gatti neri raccolsero le carni di Ange e gli arti sparsi e li lanciarono dentro ad un secchio di latta.

Steam (ST): ...Even in this miserable form... Ange's soul...was still living.
Umineko Project (UP): .........Even in this miserable form...{n}Ange's soul......was still living.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Even in this miserable form... Ange's soul......was still living.
PC Japanese (JP): ………そのような姿に変わり果てても。縁寿は、……その魂は、……まだ、生きていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ………そのような姿に変わり果てても。{n}縁寿は、……その魂は、……まだ、生きていた。
Russian (RU): ......Даже в таком убогом виде...{n}Душа Энджи... ещё была жива.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Mesmo nesta forma miserável...{n}A alma de Ange......ainda estava viva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………就算變成這種樣子。{n}緣壽，……她的靈魂，……依舊，活著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………就算变成这种样子。{n}缘寿，……她的灵魂，……依旧，活着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Perfino in questa forma miserabile... l'anima di Ange... era ancora in vita.

Steam (ST): Perhaps "living" is a poor description.
Umineko Project (UP): Perhaps "living" is a poor description.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Perhaps 'living' is a poor description.
PC Japanese (JP): 生きている、という言い方は語弊があるかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Быть может, «жива» — плохое описание.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez "viva" seja uma descrição pobre.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 還活著，這樣的說法可能有些語病。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 还活着，这样的说法可能有些语病。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse ‘in vita’ è un'espressione infelice.

Steam (ST): She...was unable to die. From now on, forever.
Umineko Project (UP): She...was unable to die. From now on, forever.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She...was unable to die. From now on, forever.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女は、死ねないのだ。これから永遠に。
Russian (RU): Она... не могла умереть. Отныне и навсегда.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela...era incapaz de morrer. De agora em diante, para sempre.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她是死不了的。在這之後永遠地。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她是死不了的。在这之后永远地。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lei... non poteva morire. Da allora in avanti, per sempre.

Steam (ST): She would drift along in the deepest depths of oblivion, covered by the dust of oblivion, until she finally...disappeared.
Umineko Project (UP): She would drift along in the deepest depths of oblivion, covered by the dust of oblivion, until she finally......disappeared.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She would drift along in the deepest depths of oblivion, covered by the dust of oblivion, until she finally......disappeared.
PC Japanese (JP): 忘却の深遠の奥底に流れ着き、忘却の埃に埋もれて、その姿が消え去るまで、……ずっとずっと。
Russian (RU): Она будет плавать под пылью забвения в его глубочайших глубинах, пока наконец...... не исчезнет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela flutuaria nas profundezas do esquecimento, coberta pelo pó do esquecimento, até que finalmente......desaparecesse.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 直至流到忘卻的深淵的底部，被忘卻的塵埃所埋，那樣子完全消失為止，……永遠永遠。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 直至流到忘却的深渊的底部，被忘却的尘埃所埋，那样子完全消失为止，……永远永远。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sarebbe andata alla deriva nei più profondi recessi dell'oblio, ricoperta dalla polvere dell'oblio, fin quando finalmente... non sarebbe scomparsa.

Steam (ST): She continued to question herself.
Umineko Project (UP): She continued to question herself.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She continued to question herself.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女は自問自答を続ける。
Russian (RU): Она продолжала спрашивать себя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela continuava a se perguntar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她還在繼續自問自答。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她还在继续自问自答。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Continuava a domandarsi.

Steam (ST): What did the truth mean to her? What was right, and where was the place she could call home...?
Umineko Project (UP): What did the truth mean to her?{n}What was right, and where was the place she could call home......?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): What did the truth mean to her? What was right, and where was the place she could call home......?
PC Japanese (JP): 自分にとって真実とは何なのか。何が正しくて、何処が帰るべきところだったのか……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 自分にとって真実とは何なのか。{n}何が正しくて、何処が帰るべきところだったのか……。
Russian (RU): Что значила для неё правда?{n}Что было верно, и где то место, которое она может назвать домом?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O que a verdade significava para ela?{n}O que seria certo, e onde seria o lugar que ela poderia chamar de lar......?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對自己來說真實是什麼。{n}什麼是正確的，哪裡是應去的歸所……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对自己来说真实是什么。{n}什么是正确的，哪里是应去的归所……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Che valore avesse la verità per lei? Cosa fosse giusto, e dove fosse il luogo che poteva chiamare casa...?

Steam (ST): As her flesh began to cool, even the energy to ask these questions...began to fade...
Umineko Project (UP): As her flesh began to cool, even the energy to ask these questions...began to fade...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): それを考える思考力も、肉塊が冷えるに従い、失われていく……。
Russian (RU): Когда её плоть стала остывать, даже энергия задавать эти вопросы... начала исчезать...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando sua carne começou a esfriar, até a energia para fazer essas perguntas...começou a desvanecer...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 考慮這些的思考能力，也隨著肉塊變冷而逐漸失去……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 考虑这些的思考能力，也随着肉块变冷而逐渐失去……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come le sue carni cominciarono a raffreddarsi, anche l'energia per farsi simili domande... cominciò a svanire...

Steam (ST): Eventually, ...she would forget her everyday memories, and even the reason why she was suffering.
Umineko Project (UP): Eventually, ......she would forget her everyday memories, and even the reason why she was suffering.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Eventually, ......she would forget her everyday memories, and even the reason why she was suffering.
PC Japanese (JP): やがて、……日々の記憶も、自分が何に苦しんでいたのかさえも、忘れてしまう。
Russian (RU): В конечном итоге... она забудет свои повседневные воспоминания и саму причину своих страданий.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eventualmente, ......ela esqueceria suas memórias do dia a dia, e até a razão pela qual ela estava sofrendo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 最終，……會連平時的記憶，自己是因為什麼而一直痛苦的，都忘記掉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 最终，……会连平时的记忆，自己是因为什么而一直痛苦的，都忘记掉。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Presto... si sarebbe dimenticata i ricordi della vita quotidiana, e perfino la ragione per cui stesse soffrendo.

Steam (ST): However, there was one thing she would never forget.
Umineko Project (UP): However, there was one thing she would never be able to forget.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, there was one thing she would never forget.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、一つだけが、永遠に忘れられない。
Russian (RU): Но кое‐что ей никогда не забыть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No entanto, havia uma coisa que ela nunca seria capaz de esquecer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，只有一點，永遠都不會忘。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，只有一点，永远都不会忘。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma, c'era una cosa che non avrebbe mai dimenticato.

Steam (ST): That was...the anguish.
Umineko Project (UP): That was...the anguish.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That was...the anguish.
PC Japanese (JP): それは、苦悶。
Russian (RU): Мучение.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E isso era...a angústia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這就是，苦悶。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这就是，苦闷。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ed era... il tormento.

Steam (ST): From this point forth, ...she would suffer endlessly without even knowing why.
Umineko Project (UP): From this point forth, ......she would suffer endlessly without even knowing why.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): From this point forth, ......she would suffer endlessly without even knowing why.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女はこれから永遠に、……何が何やらもわからぬまま永遠に、苦しみ続けるのだ。
Russian (RU): С этого момента...... она вечно будет страдать, даже не зная причины.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Deste ponto momento em diante, ......ela sofreria infinitamente, mesmo sem saber o porquê.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她此後會永遠地，……在不明所以的情況下，永遠痛苦下去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她此后会永远地，……在不明所以的情况下，永远痛苦下去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): D'ora in poi... avrebbe sofferto eternamente senza nemmeno sapere perché.

Steam (ST): By the time the cats finished flinging her corpse into the bucket and dumping it into the sea of nothingness, ...Ange had forgotten even her own name......
Umineko Project (UP): By the time the cats finished flinging her corpse into the bucket and dumping it into the sea of nothingness, ............Ange had forgotten even her own name.........
Original Witch Hunt (OG): By the time the cats finished flinging her corpse into the bucket and dumping it into the sea of nothingness, ......Ange had forgotten even her own name.........
PC Japanese (JP): 黒猫たちが、死骸を乱暴に詰め込んだバケツを、虚無の海に放り込む頃には、…………縁寿はもう、自分の名前さえも、忘れていた………。
Russian (RU): К тому времени как кошки закончили бросать её труп в вёдра и спускать его в море небытия...... Энджи забыла даже своё имя.........
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando os gatos terminaram de juntar o cadáver no balde, despejando‐o então no mar do nada, ............Ange tinha esquecido até o próprio nome.........
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黑貓們將粗暴地塞入屍骸的鐵桶，扔進虛無之海的時候，…………緣壽已經，連自己的名字，都忘記了………。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黑猫们将粗暴地塞入尸骸的铁桶，扔进虚无之海的时候，…………缘寿已经，连自己的名字，都忘记了………。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Prima che i gatti finissero di lanciare il suo corpo nel secchio e lo gettassero nel mare del nulla... Ange aveva dimenticato perfino il proprio nome...

Steam (ST): ...What's this sound I keep hearing?
Umineko Project (UP): .........What's this sound I keep hearing?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......What's this sound I keep hearing?
PC Japanese (JP): ………ずっと聞こえる、その音は何だろう。
Russian (RU): ......Что за звук я не перестаю слышать?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Que som é esse que eu continuo ouvindo?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………一直都能聽到，這聲音是什麼呢？
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………一直都能听到，这声音是什么呢？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Cos'è questo suono che continuo a sentire?

Steam (ST): Yes, it must be......the sound of rain...
Umineko Project (UP): Yes, it must be............the sound of rain...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Yes, it must be.........the sound of rain...
PC Japanese (JP): 多分、きっとそれは、…………雨の音…。
Russian (RU): Да, наверное......... шум дождя...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sim, deve ser............o som da chuva...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 大概，這應該是，…………雨聲…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 大概，这应该是，…………雨声…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sì, deve essere... il suono della pioggia...

Steam (ST): In that case, what are those two bright lights coming towards me?
Umineko Project (UP): In that case, what are those two bright lights coming towards me?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In that case, what are those two bright lights coming towards me?
PC Japanese (JP): では、あの近付いてくる眩しい二つの光は何だろう。
Russian (RU): Тогда что за два ярких огня приближаются ко мне?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nesse caso, o que são essas duas luzes brilhantes vindo em minha direção?

Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，逐渐接近过来的那两道炫目的光是什么呢？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Allora, cosa sono quelle abbaglianti luci che vengono verso di me?

Steam (ST): ...I don't know.
Umineko Project (UP): ......I don't know.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……わからない。
Russian (RU): ......Не знаю.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu não sei.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……我不知道。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non lo so.

Steam (ST): However, they came at me with a screeching sound...and stopped right in front of me.
Umineko Project (UP): However, they came at me with a screeching sound...and stopped right in front of me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, they came at me with a screeching sound...and stopped right in front of me.
PC Japanese (JP): でもそれは近付いてきて、鋭い音を立てながら、私の直前で止まった。
Russian (RU): Но они шли на меня с визжащим звуком... и остановились прямо передо мной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No entanto, elas vieram até mim com um som estridente...e pararam bem na minha frente.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是那接近过来，发出尖锐的声音，在我的面前停住了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Però, vennero verso di me accompagnate da uno stridore... e si fermarono proprio davanti a me.

Steam (ST): A blaring noise came at me over and over.
Umineko Project (UP): A blaring noise came at me over and over.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): A blaring noise came at me over and over.
PC Japanese (JP): けたたましい音が何度か浴びせられる。
Russian (RU): Ревущий шум всё шёл и шёл на меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Um barulho estridente veio a mim de novo e de novo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 尖銳的聲音數次在身邊響起。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 尖锐的声音数次在身边响起。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Un suono lacerante mi si riversò addosso più e più volte.

Steam (ST): Whatever's shining those bright lights...is threatening me. It's probably telling me to get out of the way.
Umineko Project (UP): Whatever's shining those bright lights...is threatening me.{n}It's probably telling me to get out of the way.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Whatever's shining those bright lights...is threatening me. It's probably telling me to get out of the way.
PC Japanese (JP): その眩しい光を放つ存在が、私を威嚇しているのだ。多分、どけと言っているのだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その眩しい光を放つ存在が、私を威嚇しているのだ。{n}多分、どけと言っているのだろう。
Russian (RU): Что бы это ни сияло, яркие огни... угрожают мне.{n}Возможно, говорят мне уйти с дороги.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O que quer que esteja emitindo aquelas luzes brilhantes...está me ameaçando.{n}Provavelmente está me dizendo para sair do caminho.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那放出炫目光芒的存在，是在威嚇著我。{n}大概，是在讓我躲開吧？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那放出炫目光芒的存在，是在威吓着我。{n}大概，是在让我躲开吧？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Qualunque cosa stia irradiando quelle luci... mi sta minacciando. {n}Mi sta probabilmente intimando di togliermi di mezzo.

Steam (ST): However, I was incapable of moving even a finger...
Umineko Project (UP): However, I was incapable of moving even a finger......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, I was incapable of moving even a finger......
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、私には自分の意思で指一本を動かすことも出来なかった……。
Russian (RU): Но я не могу даже пошевелить пальцем......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No entanto, eu fui incapaz de mover sequer um dedo......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，我憑自己的意識連一根手指都動不了……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，我凭自己的意识连一根手指都动不了……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, non riuscivo a muovere nemmeno un dito...

Steam (ST): There was sound...and a car door opened.
Umineko Project (UP): There was a sound......of a car door opening.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): There was sound......and a car door opened.
PC Japanese (JP): バタンと音がして、……車の扉が開く。
Russian (RU): Раздался звук...... и дверь автомобиля открылась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Houve o som......da porta de um carro se abrindo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 發出叭嗒的聲音，……車門開了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 发出叭嗒的声音，……车门开了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ci fu un suono sordo... come quello di una portiera di una macchina quando si apre.

Steam (ST): Car. ...Door.
Umineko Project (UP): Car. ......Door.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Car. ......Door.
Russian (RU): Автомобиль. ......Дверь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Carro. ......Porta.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Macchina. ... Portiera.

Steam (ST): Apparently, I was lying on asphalt under the pouring rain.
Umineko Project (UP): Apparently, I was lying on asphalt under the pouring rain.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Apparently, I was lying on asphalt under the pouring rain.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は雨に打たれながら、アスファルトの上で横たわっているようだった。
Russian (RU): Судя по всему, я лежал на асфальте под проливным дождём.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aparentemente, eu estava deitada no asfalto, sob a chuva que caía.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我似乎是被雨水敲打著，橫躺在柏油路上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我似乎是被雨水敲打着，横躺在柏油路上。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Apparentemente, giacevo sull'asfalto sotto la pioggia battente.
